definitions.definition: The act or process of becoming manifest.
definitions.example: The last known manifestation of the ghost was over ten years ago.

definitions.definition: The embodiment of an intangible, or variable thing.
definitions.example: This particular manifestation resembled a young girl crying.

definitions.definition: The symptoms or observable conditions which are seen as a result of some disease.
A pattern or logo on a sheet of glass, as decoration and/or to prevent people from accidentally walking in to it.
